name: mox
description: Mox is a self-hosted email server supporting SMTP and IMAP with modern features like DKIM, DANE, and automated TLS. Itâ€™s designed to be simple and secure, with text-based configuration and minimal dependencies.
features: SMTP and IMAP: Send and receive email with full protocol support for modern mail clients and mobile devices.
DKIM signing: Authenticate outgoing messages with cryptographic signatures to improve deliverability and prevent spoofing.
DANE support: Secure mail transport with DNS-based certificate validation for enhanced encryption between servers.
Automated TLS: Obtain and renew certificates automatically using ACME protocol for encrypted connections without manual setup.
Spam filtering: Block unwanted messages using reputation lists, content analysis, and customizable rules.
Text configuration: Define server settings in human-readable config files without complex GUI or database dependencies.
Web interface: Manage accounts, view logs, and configure domains through a built-in administrative dashboard.
Minimal dependencies: Run on standard Linux systems with few external requirements for simplified deployment and maintenance.
